original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Pathavīvagga
analyzed: pathavīvagga

original: 7. Candaṅgapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, ‘candassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena candassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, cando sukkapakkhe udayanto uttaruttariṁ vaḍḍhati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja candaḥ sukka pakkhe udayantaḥ uttaruttarim vaḍḍhati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭipattiyā āgamādhigame
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ācāra sīla guṇavat tad paṭipattiyā āgama adhigame

original: paṭisallāne satipaṭṭhāne indriyesu guttadvāratāya bhojane mattaññutāya jāgariyānuyoge
analyzed: paṭisallāne sati paṭṭhāne indriyesu gutta dvāra tāya bhojane mattaññu tāya jāgariya anuyoge

original: uttaruttariṁ vaḍḍhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: uttaruttarim

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, candassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja candassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, cando uḷārādhipati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja cando uḷāra adhipati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uḷārena chandādhipatinā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena uḷārena chanda adhipatinā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, candassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja candassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, cando nisāya carati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja candaḥ nisāya carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pavivittena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena pavivittena

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, candassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja candassa tatiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, cando vimānaketu;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja cando vimāna ketu

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlaketunā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sīlaketunā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, candassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja candassa catuttham aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, cando āyācitapatthito udeti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja candaḥ āyācita patthitaḥ udeti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āyācitapatthitena kulāni upasaṅkamitabbāni.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena āyācita patthitena kulāni upasaṅkamitabbāni

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, candassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja candassa pañcamam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṁyuttanikāyavare ‘candūpamā, bhikkhave, kulāni upasaṅkamatha, apakasseva kāyaṁ apakassa cittaṁ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā’”ti.
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sayutta nikāya vare canda upamā bhikkhave kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakassa iva kāyam apakassa cittam nicca navakā kulesu

original: Candaṅgapañho sattamo.
analyzed: candaṅgapañho sattamo
